value.title: Kyndryl and Microsoft expand partnership to drive mainframe connectivity
value.excerpt: IT infrastructure services provider Kyndryl has expanded its strategic partnership with Microsoft as it looks to help customers expand and increase access to mainframe data. The collaboration will see Kyndryl create data pipes that enable connections between the mainframe - including its zCloud platform - and the Microsoft Cloud.
